Title: Requires the state office for the aging to publish a "Guide to Actions When Someone Close Dies"
Summary: Requires the state office for the aging to publish a "Guide to Actions When Someone Close Dies".
LawCode: Amd ยง226, Eld L (as proposed in S.4351-A & A.3939-A)
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the elder law, in relation to publishing a guide to actions when someone close dies
